comments.content:
29.006 is my brandnew favourite...   
i looove it...

A lot of good ones in this batch. 29.005 and 29.009, 29.0010 are all really strong. I would wear them all but I'd rather wear 29.006. It really captures the beauty of hand lettered type.   
Pablo
Hehe. Kitsch, Chris. Kitsch and unpredictability.

29.006 has some of the quiet, unobtrusive charm that i had (secretly) hoped to find here more frequently.   
honestly, i would never wear a tee with a really large print on it. but then, i am not an american.   
   
kai

29008 is right off of the Type Directors Club annual (28?, the last one in any case)   
   
complete giveaway as to who the designer HAS to be.
